entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 4:58PM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pleasants, northwestern Ritchie and east central Wood Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 455 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near North Bend State Park, or 9 miles west of Harrisville, moving west- northwest at 5 to 10 mph.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A cluster of showers with heavy rain will impact portions of western and central Fayette County through 530 PM EDT... At 440 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fayetteville, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rainfall of up to an inch per hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated.
